name: pnp-sp-dev-spfx-web-parts-react-sp-org-chart
title: Building Org Chart using a SharePoint list
shortDescription: Displays your organization's structure based on a custom list, starting from the top boss down to everyone else.
longDescription: This Org Chart Web Part displays your organization's structure based on a custom list, starting from the top boss down to everyone else.
Each person's card shows their name and job title, and when you click on someone, it highlights them so you can focus on where they sit in the company.

references.name: Build your first SharePoint client-side web part
references.description: Client-side web parts are client-side components that run in the context of a SharePoint page. Client-side web parts can be deployed to SharePoint environments that support the SharePoint Framework. You can also use modern JavaScript web frameworks, tools, and libraries to build them.
